title: FS:  Low Grade raw T206's SOLD

posts.post_title: FS:  Low Grade raw T206's SOLD
posts.post_content:
Selling these raw T206's range poor to good. All have light creases but otherwise nice pictures. Will always consider fair offers.
Bresnahan, HOF batting (poor) Piedmont 350/25        $35 SOLD
Demmitt, N.Y. (good) Piedmont 350/25                      $25 SOLD
Ferris, St. Louis (good) Piedmont 350/25                    $25 SOLD
Jones, St. Louis (fair) Sweet Caporal 150/30               $25 SOLD

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=314099&d=1525048964[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=314100&d=1525048977[/IMG]
I'll take the Denmitt, send me your PayPal info!
